column1: Q1. Please order these questions from most (first) to least (last) true.
People in the group are working together to solve a problem
She is referring to everybody in the group
There is tension between people in the group
People in the group disagree with one another
This group consists of many people
People in the group generally get along
The speaker likes the people in the group
The speaker is in annoyed with the group
The speaker is in control of the group
The speaker is open to feedback from the group
